        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="49104" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="49104" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.13</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2234">2,234</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="272"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Tam Dao Eau de Parfum</b> by <b>Diptyque</b> is a Woody fragrance for women and men. <b>Tam Dao Eau de Parfum</b> was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Daniel Moliere. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"Memories of Asia. In the depths of the jungle, the ancient trees intertwine. The magnificence of precious Goa Sandalwood and the brittle dryness of Cedar, blended with the sparkle of exotic spices and the warmth of amber." - a note from the brand.</p></div><p                     Not enough sandalwood for some

                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    </div>
                    Unnatural woody aspect
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">

                    Too sweet and vanillic for some

class="cell small-12"><similar-perfumes :perfume_id="49104" title="This perfume reminds me of"><div class="strike-title">

class="grid-x grid-margin-x" id="newreview" style="margin-top:30px"><div class="rw-frame"><p class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angelsnake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116460"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2116460.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angelsnake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/The-Noir-29-31872.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31872.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Noir 29"title="The Noir 29"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116460">Angelsnake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733364086" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love, love, LOVE Tam Dao's scent profile, but after multiple wears of samples and some full sprays from the Diptyque store, I've decided this thing just doesn't like my skin chemistry. It's just WAYYYYY too light on me, and barely projects. Every time I ask someone if they smell it on me from a foot and a half away, they don't. <br />
<br />
It's such a shame. I want this to be part of my collection so bad, but if it's this light on me even if I'm only wearing it for me, I can't justify the purchase. <br />
<br />
If anyone else has this problem, I highly recommend just going for something like Feminite du Bois from Serge Lutens. Not only can you find it way cheaper, but it performs SO much better. They don't smell alike, but they're in the same family. FdB has the majority of the notes listed for TD, but with more complexity adding a plum and rose aspect to the dark woodiness of FdB. I would also highly recommend Eilish No. 2 for anyone looking to ride this vibe of woody scent. <br />
<br />
I will GLADLY accept Tam Dao EDP as a gift, but for now, I can't justify spending the money on it just based on performance alone. I'm very jealous of everyone who this performs well on. You guys smell incredible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2371164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2371164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2370394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2370394" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Matesh99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2347541"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Matesh99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2370394ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2370394" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2347541">Matesh99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733318994" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My favourite fragrance ever if i rate it just by scent profile. Wonderfuly creamy, woody and very calming. Love to smell it when im just quietly sitting looking at wonderful lush trees around me. Did not get the smell of pencil shavings or sawmill like a lot of reviewers mentioned. Smells very realistic but not entirely wild and natural(not in a bad way). The opening reminds me of a lovely cozy cabin with lush tropical forest acting in the background. Dries down rather quickly to milky woodiness. <br />
This would be my signature scent if not for the very weak performance on my skin. Sillage is moderate but logetivity is 2 hours max on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2370394"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2370394#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amgenus2015"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1656684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amgenus2015" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Van-Cleef-Arpels/Orchidee-Vanille-6463.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6463.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orchidee Vanille"title="Orchidee Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1656684">amgenus2015</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a peaceful scent. Almost like a more concentrated and wearable version of what would scent the air at a luxury spa. Youve just finished your mud wrap and now youre on the way to a sauna<br />
<br />
I first felt that I was getting a white tea from the fragrance, but that makes sense now that I see there is ginger. As it dries down, that ginger grows spicier and more prominent on my skin. <br />
<br />
The EDT has an airier element, and while they are unique enough I dont think you need to own both. Theyd be work for the same sort of occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2368521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2368521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364394" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2360542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360542" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IamdrinkingBeer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IamdrinkingBeer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Fleur-d-Oranger-27-6331.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6331.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur d'Oranger 27"title="Fleur d'Oranger 27"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360542ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360542" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309936">IamdrinkingBeer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 03:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly vanillic, slightly spicy, but mostly creamy sawdust. Smooth wood, in the league of Le Labo Gaiac 10 and Tom Ford Oud Wood, very calm and relaxed scent. High quality, well blended. It could be a great signature scent.<br />
<br />
Try this if you like: Serge Lutens Santal de Mysore, Tom Ford Santal Blush, Hermessence Santal Massoia</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2360542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2360542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2356901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356901" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aenflex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158381"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aenflex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158381">aenflex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tam Dao is amazing. I have sampled it many times over the years. Like lots of years. <br />
<br />
Diptyque has their shit together. The level of precision, the perfection of the blending, the weave of this perfume is sublime. <br />
<br />
Never overdressed, but thoughtfully styled. Nothing out of place, no loose threads or scuffs, no flashy bling, no pink sweatpants. Clean, concise, understated. Not hard nor soft, genderless. There is beauty in simplicity. <br />
<br />
Tam Dao is put together well. So well as to disappear on me, or rather it becomes me. Natural, unobtrusive, clean. <br />
<br />
I finally bought a bottle after all these years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2356901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2356901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354795" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ayshee_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1435558"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1435558.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ayshee_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Magnolia-83621.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83621.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"title="Flora Gorgeous Magnolia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354795ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354795" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1435558">ayshee_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Eau de pencil shavings- Im kind of obsessed. I wouldnt wear it personally because in all honesty, the opening is a bit ashy but that goes away in the dry down and I just want to keep smelling it. It evokes such a nostalgic feeling- its like walking through a forest when its just been raining. Its woody, fresh with a bit of spiciness and if you love unisex woody fragrances, this would totally be your vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2354795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2354795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351398" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AidaVeda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1468532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AidaVeda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-Intense-79602.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79602.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Bloom Intense"title="Gucci Bloom Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468532">AidaVeda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 17:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a woody for this woody fragrance, it smells like our teakwood cabinets in Thailand. I love and appreciate the high quality and realistic scent, but personally I need something more feminine. Today, just for fun, I tried layering it with Burberry Goddess in hopes that it would smell like honeycomb toffee. The vanilla just swallowed it up into a brown sugar/vanilla accord. I think it would make a great room scent or candle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2351398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2351398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349237" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cloudfruit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1617661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cloudfruit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Dans-Le-Bleu-Qui-Petille-74024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dans Le Bleu Qui Ptille"title="Dans Le Bleu Qui Ptille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1617661">cloudfruit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 17:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an interesting one, for very personal reasons. <br />
<br />
My paternal grandmother's house in the early 2000s was very beautiful. She was definitely a...maximalist, I'd saythough I think the professional term is "hoarder" but I'll be damned if she didn't have a keen eye for decoration, and the house was kept very clean. I spent a lot of time with her and in her house as a little girl, so I had consistently had a room on the ground floor with a nice bathroom, but favorite grandkid or not I was still banished to sleep in the basement with all the other kids during the larger family gatherings. The bathroom in the basement was considerably less nice; no amount of fancy dcor could mask that the house was very old and quite run-down, so the entire bottom floor and the bathroom especially was perpetually damp, much to my cousins' and I's chagrin. But there was a TV down there too so it was whatever. I remember I always hated using that bathroom. Thinking about it now, that bathroom likely started my lifelong "Thing" I have about not feeling like I'm actually clean until I'm dry, which has likely, over the course of my life, lead to a disproportionately high per-capita amount of trees felled for the mountains of paper towels I use up every time I wash my hands in a public restroom. I'll be lumped in with Bezos and Swift and the other climate terrorists when the class war breaks out: "Many years later, as she faced the firing squad, Colonel UserID Cloudfruit was to remember that distant afternoon when her father took her to discover that dusty ass musty ass basement bathroom..." <br />
<br />
Anyways, Tam Dao smells like that bathroom. The scent of Korean cleaning products masking stale air and mildew is one I was very familiar with at one point in my life, and one I despised. It follows that I hate this, right? I mean, it smells, to put it simply, bad. Rank. Moldy. Etc. But as you might have guessed if anyone has actually read this psychotic, unhinged apery of a "review" that would've gotten me permanently banned for topic derailment on any other respectable website, I am really quite fond of Tam Dao. It has taken me back to a place I have been many times before, a place I never liked being but right now at this very moment I'd give you everything I own to be there again. I really miss that dusty ass musty ass bathroom. It was my grandma's dusty ass musty ass bathroom. So this perfume, rank as it is, has sentimental value to me, and now every time I smell it I will think of and be closer to Marie, whom I love and miss dearly. Here's to you, Tam Dao, for bringing her to me, though I could do with just Marie, I'll gladly take the package deal: Marie AND her smelly ass bathroom. Geonbae.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2349237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2349237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348087" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OneEyedOdin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253036"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OneEyedOdin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253036">OneEyedOdin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 17:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a little obsessed. So mysterious and beautiful. Gorgeous cedar in the opening and the lime note in the dry down is tantalizing. I can see how the wood notes would be too much for some but I am a certified pencil shaving lover.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2348087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2348087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343683" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="viez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="viez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159">viez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 17:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really thought I'd like this but the sharp Cedar is too overwhelming for my liking</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2343683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2343683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338020" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Milk-67819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 13:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasantly surprised! Light, complex. Woody and laidback. <br />
<br />
Strong forest green cedar opening, followed by incense which balances it out. Dries down to a dreamy sandalwood and lime. The wood here is sanded and polished, worked over and oiled. Its wood post-human intervention. Very clean, hints of mens aftershave but a tinge warmer and creamier. Refreshing. <br />
<br />
Theres something about it thats too lightweight for me: despite the strong woods in the opening, the sandalwood base of this scent lacks depth. As a result, it fades so quickly it might find more success as a room spray. <br />
<br />
I love this fragrance, I really do.. but this is one of the only perfumes whose performance is so poor that it affects my enjoyment of it. Fingers crossed they make an extrait version sometime soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2338020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2338020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mike-D-11201"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mike-D-11201" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/24-rue-de-l-Universite-47671.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47671.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="24 rue de l'Universit"title="24 rue de l'Universit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2262919">Mike-D-11201</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-01">11/01/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A mysterious, androgynous figure wearing a subtle sandalwood scent wafts through the lumber aisle at Home Depot. Just a bit too saw-dusty for my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2334669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2334669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332539" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dianediane16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1999631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1999631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dianediane16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1999631">dianediane16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The initial spray has a sharp green or ginger scent and when you sniff deeply, as the other people said, you can hear the pencil shavings scent. However, as it dries down on the skin, it becomes very soft, elegant, and sweet, I do like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2332539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2332539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325232" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jolene83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1867540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1867540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jolene83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Laboratorio-Olfattivo/Vanagloria-66238.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66238.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanagloria"title="Vanagloria"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1867540">Jolene83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im quite partial to a filthy fragrance, but this is altogether more high-minded. Holy incense but cozy and creamy: shes a nun swathed in cashmere. <br />
<br />
I have both the EDP and the EDT, and Ill usually use the EDP on my skin - its spicier and more peppery - and top up with the lighter, sweeter EDT in my hair. I do find I cant smell it on myself after a while, and Ive experimented with layering it over inexpensive musky vanilla types with good results. <br />
<br />
But I dont even care how long it lasts, the opening is true love. <br />
<br />
One of my two favourite perfumes, the other being rather carnal: if that one is body, this one is mind.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2325232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2325232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TWN2RBO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1946489.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TWN2RBO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Amber-Absolute-1821.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1821.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Absolute"title="Amber Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946489">TWN2RBO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 11:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Took my 2015 Tam Dao bottle off the shelf today and blew the dust off it. This could have been named one of the best natural high end raw material sandalwood scents of all time, but its poor longevity has strayed many away. The good news is you can find it for a good price and if you do happen to like sandalwood fragrances, you have to try this one. I personally dont own it to wear it often, I just really enjoy taking it out occasionally to spray it on my hand and keep smelling it until its gone. Some may say that aroma therapy. This fragrance makes me happy. Love it . Can be worn any time any place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2325098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2325098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303216" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siempre777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853448"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siempre777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853448">Siempre777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Like mentioned before I am picking it up as mostly dry sandalwood, incense, coriander, and a slight peanut smell in that order. Little to no lime, ginger or vanilla. Its very dry woody thats linear and not very long lasting. On the plus, I can see how this a very realistic sandalwood scent. Its got a dark spicy vibe that may be good for layering. 7.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2303216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2303216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302036" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302036" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KJS88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="KJS88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fragonard/Zizanie-7379.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7379.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zizanie"title="Zizanie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302036ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302036" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47741">KJS88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 01:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tam Dao is emblematic of the problem I have with almost all Diptyque scents. I fall in love with them for four months, stop using them, then treat them like super-indulgent room sprays. Many of them smell expensive and well-made, yet also unfinished and impractical to wear. That in itself is sort of weird for me - I love their aesthetic, but I feel like theyre better suited to an eccentric professor or art gallery owner than myself.<br />
<br />
This one is throwing out a throbbing, natural cedar, garnished with pepper, peanuts, something oaky or peaty. <br />
<br />
Well made, pleasant, even, but ultimately it feels "impractical" to wear. I want to be clear about that - I don't find it unwearable, just impractical, and it left me feeling like I should have picked something else to wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2302036"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2302036#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adjn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1535227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adjn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Do-Son-Eau-de-Toilette-6501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Do Son Eau de Toilette"title="Do Son Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535227">adjn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tam Dao steps out of their one-bedroom flat to a bright, crisp, beginning-of-autumn morning. They wear a traditional Burberry-esque (but not actually Burberry, but maybe?) trench coat, and a cashmere turtleneck. The heels of their shoes click on the pavement with the slight crunch of wet leaves sprinkled in.<br />
<br />
The humidity of summer is starting to settle, with the dew gathering to the blades of grass. The smell of decaying leaves in the wind. <br />
<br />
Tam Dao's elegance comes from it's simplicity. Stays longer on the clothes than the skin. Honestly I seem to grab this in Autumn and Only in Autumn. (and at this point I'm wondering if it's accidental, random, or subliminal queues from my brain.) I'm not a fan of it when I spray it but the scent it leaves on my clothes is lovely and warm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2299926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2299926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="josella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1108881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="josella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dioramour-48397.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48397.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dioramour"title="Dioramour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1108881">josella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 18:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had wanted to find a stronger dupe for Aesop Eidesis and felt in love with this when I tested it at the store. However when I tried on my skin, the longevity and silage is super weak I can barely smell it on me after 15mins. Super love the sandal wood scent but very disappointed with the longevity.  The performance is weaker than Aesop. Not worth it at this price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2297401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2297401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295460" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2295460"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2295460#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2293132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2293132" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Claugregg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1439753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Claugregg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2293132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2293132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439753">Claugregg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 21:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pleasant sandalwood perfume. It's slightly spicy with the notes of coriander, and the ginger notes gives it a lil kick! It's one of my favorites in the Diptyque collection. Perfect if you want a unisex wood that is a little out there and unique, without being too intimidating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2293132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2293132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139830">cowgirllikeme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 01:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This just scratches my throat and when I sprayed on my skin it made me sick. Spent good 10 minutes scrubbing it off surely lasts well <br />
I despise it, never hated something this much at first sniff but I understand why someone might like it. Its so spicy and pure sandalwood with ginger which is just more spice and there is no warmth or depth, it just makes me cough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2274336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2274336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273926" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celestialjewel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1248537"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1248537.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celestialjewel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-de-Minthe-54387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Minth"title="Eau de Minth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1248537">Celestialjewel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Instantly calming. The combination of sandalwood and coriander creates a beautiful woody dryness that is complimented with the smooth vanilla and heated with ginger. Even after several years I continue to reach for this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2273926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2273926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2271623" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NewbyNB"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NewbyNB" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2271623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2271623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2243463">NewbyNB</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not a fan. I'm not quite sure how to describe what I don't like about it as I'm pretty new to perfumes, but I don't like the "green spicyness". Not sure if that's the ginger and lime or something else. <br />
<br />
Interestingly, when I sprayed it on paper I didn't mind it? I feel like it would be great in a reed diffuser in a high end bathroom (I mean that as a compliment, sincerely!). I wonder if it's because it has a 'stringent' quality that very clean sort of bathrooms have? Or maybe even like a unique kind of after shave? Idk but I may experiment making it a reed diffuser (unless someone in my life likes it, in which case I'd rather gift it, I think)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
