align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2097139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2097139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090436" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Payneslayer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Payneslayer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054655">Payneslayer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-12">03/12/24 12:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved the smell but the projection and the lasting at least on my skin was so weak that I ended up disliking it for the price i paid but it does smell great to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2090436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2090436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081519" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vanilljmaniac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713423"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713423.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vanilljmaniac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713423">Vanilljmaniac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I totally agree with your review, akarain (01/24/24) !!<br />
<br />
I'm from Japan and this gem really reminded me of temples in my homeland.<br />
We have a lot of temples, and this especially reminded me of the Eiheiji-temple () which is located in the middle-northern part of Japan. This temple is in the woods of pine trees and cedar trees. <br />
<br />
I felt the TD EDP scent when we sat on a bench outside the main temple which was surrounded by great nature. <br />
The scent mixed with a great outdoor woody scent and the scent from the main temple. <br />
(It was a lucky encounter buying this after we visited there because I had been missing that surroundings and scents mixed all together)<br />
<br />
In the temple, we were surrounded by sandalwood scents from everywhere, with incense scents. <br />
The scents mixed together were sweet and heavenly calm.<br />
<br />
Whenever I smell this gem, I remember the river outside the temple streamed calmly,  trees shining and singing together with small birds under the warm sunshine of early summer, huge wooden corridor in the main temple with soft shades of woods and sophisticated yet pure faces of monks in training.<br />
<br />
This is one of my big favourite scents and the only scent reminds me of my sweet memories from homeland, so far.<br />
<br />
I wished the longevity could be a bit longer.. but for me, this is very much enough to enjoy a nostalgic and beautiful scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2081519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2081519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wizard Rev Hunt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/74970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.74970.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wizard Rev Hunt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/Ambre-114-4493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre 114"title="Ambre 114"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/74970">Wizard Rev Hunt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 09:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been a longtime Tam Dao fan for at least 10 years, but the TD I owned was the EDT. It was woody and saunalike with a pencil shaving sharpness that woke me up, and also put me into a contemplative mood.<br />
<br />
Surfing eBay a few weeks ago I found a seller offering a Tam Dao EDP (not EDT) for $100, unopened, in the box. Then the seller reduced the price to $90.<br />
<br />
I believe this normally sells for about $175 if not more. So I jumped on it, thinking the EDP Tam Dao would be a more intense version of the EDT.<br />
<br />
Boy was I wrong!<br />
<br />
The EDP is so very subltle, with creamy, milky, laconic notes, and just a small hint of wood. I also detect vanilla.  It stays very close to the skin, and reacts to my chemistry more like a slightly scented hand cream. It is really hard to connect the Tam Dao EDP with Tam Dao EDT but somehow I like them both. The EDP Tam Dao is like taking a freshly laundered and dried shirt out of the dryer and putting it on to experience something fresh, clean and comforting. <br />
<br />
Lesson: don't blind buy, but if you do, expect that you won't get what you expected.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2079964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2079964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Miss Maven Moon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Miss Maven Moon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Haute-Fragrance-Company-HFC/Wrap-Me-in-Dreams-62855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wrap Me in Dreams"title="Wrap Me in Dreams"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307631">Miss Maven Moon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a nice layering scent for me, I generally use this with roses musk, or Geranium odorata. Other than that, this is so heavenly on my boyfriend. <br />
<br />
I sprayed a few spritz on him and there is something really sexy about a man smelling like fresh cut wood. He wore this while wearing a flannel, Paul Bunyan would be proud!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2074726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2074726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068113" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068113" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Taurien"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1187295.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Taurien" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068113ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068113" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187295">Taurien</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tam Dao is a beautiful perfume that has accompanied me in the most difficult moments of my life and I know that because of this I will not be able to use it again. But it makes me happy to have been able to wear it and to have used the peace that its scent transmits because it was what I needed. A thousand thanks to the dear friend that gifted me the decant.<br />
<br />
The opening of Tam Dao is somewhat citrusy but above all spicy, with green lemon and ginger opening the fragrance. Then the development of the perfume is a woody, with green aspects and the freshness of still alive wood but, at the same time, it feels warm and embracing. Its predominant note is a slightly sweet and even somewhat incensed Indian sandalwood.<br />
<br />
It is a long-lasting perfume but with a rather intimate sillage, meditative, that subtly accompanies you. On my skin it usually lasts about 7-8 hours.<br />
<br />
Compared to Santal du Pacifique by Perris Montecarlo, although in both the main note is sandalwood (Australian in this case), I find Perris's perfume much drier, although also fresher and livelier. Perhaps I would say that it is more joyful, while Tam Dao invites more to meditation.<br />
<br />
Scent 7.5/10<br />
Duration 7.5/10<br />
Sillage 6.5/10<br />
Quality/price 7/10<br />
Versatility 8/10<br />
Packaging 10/10<br />
Would I buy again? I did not buy it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2068113"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2068113#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067418" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067418" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xloni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1972846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xloni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Oud-Stallion-83822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Stallion"title="Oud Stallion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067418ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067418" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972846">Xloni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 14:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Might have gotten a bad batch but I only smell very little wood and a hint of lime, it does not last at all on my skin or clothes (Less than 30 minutes and it is gone) and it just smells very dusty. It smells like a concrete house during the construction phase in a desert.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2067418"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2067418#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065875" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ifeelodd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1998374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ifeelodd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065875ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065875" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1998374">ifeelodd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like my home in Sri Lanka where I grew up burning sandalwood incense. The dry down has my nose constantly sniffing my skin and clothes at work. And I think gypsy water is lighter Tam Dao. But I prefer Tam Dao EDP because it has one of the most realistic sandalwood smells eversuch a comforting scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2065875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2065875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coppersulfate"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898638"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898638.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coppersulfate" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Fleur-de-Peau-Eau-de-Parfum-48681.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48681.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"title="Fleur de Peau Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898638">Coppersulfate</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The reason i love this perfume is because it smells exactly like a candle my best friend got me at tk maxx when we were kids. it was pecksniffs re-covery. its discontinued and i havent been able to find anything like it.. until i smelled this.<br />
<br />
its so beautiful. truly in love with this scent. it deserves all the popularity it has because its so dear to me. the sandalwood is so creamy and so delicious that i almost wanna gnaw at the imaginary log of wood in my head. all the other notes are good as well, but none of them interfere with the beauty of the sandalwood. the weird thing is that the candle im talking about did not have any of these notes in it. so im curious as to why they smell similar and why i like it so much. Its hard to describe it, but its an aromatic sweet creamy green woody fragrance that is very powdery and kissed by the sun. If you've ever had mastic flavored ice cream, you'' know what im talking about. theres nothing exactly like it. <br />
<br />
my biggest wish is that they make a more long lasting version of this. feels like a watse to use up such a beautiful fragrance but its too addictive as well. 10/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2062132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2062132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059033" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daddy_longlegs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900564"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1900564.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daddy_longlegs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gio"title="Acqua di Gio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900564">Daddy_longlegs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you buy it for sandalwood, be ready for a shock because you can hardly detect it.  It's eerily similar to Santal 33 by le labo which in my opinion is not a very good sandalwood scent. If you want sandalwood then go for kilian's sacred wood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2059033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2059033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sltvni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2000586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sltvni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2000586">sltvni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 22:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a very powdery and slightly spicy perfume, with creamy sandalwood. when it dries down on the skin, you can smell some hints of vanilla. overall, the smell reminds me of an old bookshelf.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2051591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2051591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040736" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="akarain"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1944120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="akarain" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coromandel-Eau-de-Parfum-41783.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41783.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"title="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1944120">akarain</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I want to love this. I do love this. <br />
Alas I won't buy this, and would struggle to recommend that others do. <br />
<br />
Tam Dao is a perfectly nuanced sandalwood, expertly balanced on a razor's edge between warmth and cleanliness. <br />
It is a wooden bench in a Japanese temple. I've travelled to Japan, and sat on those temple benches, and this perfectly recalls that moment for me. I adore its ability to do so. Unfortunately, just like that trip, this fragrance runs its course all too soon. <br />
<br />
The journey to the base is urgent, but perfunctory and lacking in any real drama - the very slight vanilla and musk rapidly retreat to expose a perfect lightly-incensed sandalwood, and little else. That's not a complaint - it's beautiful in its simplicity. It's meditative and soothing, but without feeling cloying or in any way cosseting. <br />
<br />
And then it's gone. On my skin, I get about 2 hours. It lasts much longer on paper, but alas, I'm not carrying much paper around with me these days. Similarly, projection is not high. Given the nature of the fragrance, an understated arms-reach level of projection would be magnificent, but that is a stretch within the first 20 minutes, and inconceivable beyond that. <br />
<br />
This is so wonderful, and such a disappointment. If Diptyque ever release an extrait line, I sincerely hope this takes centre stage. I will be first to buy it, and remain a very calm, meditative person from that point onwards. Until then I shall continue upon my path of agitated, restless destruction. The ball is in your lightly scented court, Diptyque.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2040736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2040736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027772" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="confornia_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901842"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="confornia_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901842">confornia_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's honestly a perfect sandalwood incense fragrance. At first I thought it was bland but it stays on the ski really well and seems to improve with time. Cant see myself getting tired of this, and if you like woody fragrances this is a winner. Haven't tried EDT</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2027772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2027772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027734" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775729"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1775729.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pernoire/Otimo-97099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Otimo"title="Otimo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1775729">Noir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely, cozy sandalwood fragrance. I have never smelled another fragrance that closely resembles this one. It has a dark vibe to it, which I particularly like. Performance is alright; nothing amazing; you would probably have to reapply again during the day as it is fairly soft projecting. That being said, this is definitely one of the best from the house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2027734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2027734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not my thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2024832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2024832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alien2002"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1956187.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alien2002" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pearfat-Parfum/Amicus-Cumulus-79997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amicus Cumulus"title="Amicus Cumulus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1956187">alien2002</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>on my skin, i cant really get any of the gourmand notes so I really just get the strong wood and incense scents. still beautiful and perfect go to for a woodsy masculine leaning scent. i have to be careful though because its VERY strong. one spray and im set all day</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2019062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2019062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012282" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="isabb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1944495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1944495.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="isabb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1944495">isabb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, Tam Dao is a French take on fine Japanese incense, and a remarkably balanced interpretation. Like a fine Japanese sandalwood incense, smokey and woody notes are uplifted by subtly green citrus notes. These earthy notes are then combined with powdery, vanilla notes evoking french pastries. The scent has a gourmand edge, powdered sugar and chestnut paste. It's a lovely, modern scent that doesn't shy from a tinge of rococo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2012282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2012282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentualmango"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1301216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentualmango" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Ilha-do-Mel-30274.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30274.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ilha do Mel"title="Ilha do Mel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1301216">scentualmango</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-23">12/23/23 20:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a beautifully written fragrance. Theres a luxury within its simplicity of notes. When I first smelled Tam Dao I got the impression of peanuts for sure. But the star of the show is the smoothness and creaminess of the sandalwood. The lime isnt in the forefront but paired with the ginger it offers a crisp refreshment very slight spiciness. Could this be considered a realistic gourmand like a previous reviewer suggested as the notes ring true to a lot of pantries in South Asia? Not on my skin, its more of an homage to raw ingredients, the than its ground or dried counterparts. Speaking of dry, Tam Dao on my skin was described by my wife as A box of the most expensive Egyptian musk sitting in sauna in the middle of the desert in August with a nectar of some sort dripping in a vat of awesome. Truly a beautiful gender neutral experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2009216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2009216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002166" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Verrucosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Verrucosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Philosykos-Eau-de-Parfum-3865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"title="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002166ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002166" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324123">Verrucosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm glad other people mentioned a peanut note because I definitely got that and wasn't crazy about it at first. Strangely enough, I've come to love it precisely because of the peanut note. It's like cracking open roasted peanut shells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="2002166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=2002166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1997713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1997713" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="consuelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1709321"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1709321.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="consuelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Apollonia-55970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Apollonia"title="Apollonia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1997713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1997713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1709321">consuelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-10">12/10/23 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am addicted. During summer I got a decant and wore it while at a vacation in Sicily. I would have never expected that this type of scent is gonna work so well during really hot days but it really did. It has transformed into a really special dry (on my skin) woody almost skin scent and since that day I was hooked. I went through the decant and was begging my BF to buy it for me for my bday, haha. So it's past my bday, I got my Tam Dao and I had a chance to try wearing it during winter. TBH I did love it a lil bit more as a summer scent. Now in winter it reminds me a lil bit of Replica by the fireplace which I'm not a huuuge fan of but the difference is luckily the fact that Tam Dao doesn't have that "fire" smell (which I didn't like) so it's still very much wearable for me and I think this one will become one of my two signature scents. love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nycarty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540879"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1540879.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nycarty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540879">nycarty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 20:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>no clue why people are being so harsh on this one. really smooth, creamy sandalwood. nice subtle spice and greenness. layers well with certain fragrances, but is also independent and works by itself. doesn't have the best longevity or sillage but just be generous with the spray and make sure to get your pulse points</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1994584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1994584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1990792" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JNlangley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1912954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JNlangley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1990792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1990792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912954">JNlangley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-02">12/02/23 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strolling through the deep dark woods you stumble upon a gnarled wooden cabin, surrounded by towering pine trees. The scent of the trees is there but the over arching smell is smoke coming from the windows, thick with spices. Whoever lives there is casting spells for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1990792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1990792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1983135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1983135" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pilotdc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pilotdc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1983135ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1983135" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795">pilotdc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-22">11/22/23 23:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not a strong performer, but I like it. Much better performance than the EDT, though. Very woody, but a little sour from the lime, plus some herbs and ginger. I'm guessing if some people smell this on you, they may assume that you spent too much time in a Thai restaurant because several of the notes are very prominent in Thai cooking. Not full bottle worthy for me for that reason, plus the price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1983135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1983135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1974801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Am I the only one?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1974801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1974801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949579" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lemonlye"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/236236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.236236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lemonlye" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949579ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949579" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/236236">lemonlye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 17:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now we are talking! Gorgeous sandalwood, balancing the dry woody side with the sweet creamy side. Both are in evidence and meld beautifully. Diptyque has this talent for earthy, natural, contemplative scentsmakes me think of the competent, mellow hippie community members of western Oregon in my childhood in the 80s. (This is a good thing in my memory associations.) Tam Dao is Buddhist-temple-worthy but also just cozy and yummy. Not just a keeper but a collection staple, I daresay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1949579"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1949579#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Official Diptyque sample vial.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1933927"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1933927#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933805" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AxeBodySpray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496523"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AxeBodySpray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496523">AxeBodySpray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 14:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not a perfume for a south east asian man like myself. <br />
<br />
If you're not aware, SEA diet has a lot of coriander in it. That's what you smell like if you don't use a deodorant. If you smelled BO from any SEA person chances are you are familiar with this. <br />
<br />
To me, this Tam Dao EDP smells like someone who's on a coriander heavy diet forgot to use deodorant, and instead sprayed some sandalwood perfume on to mask it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1933805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1933805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919070" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fenrar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1718624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1718624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fenrar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lalique/Lalique-Pour-Homme-1844.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1844.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lalique Pour Homme"title="Lalique Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1718624">Fenrar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 19:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening up I get spicy ginger with lime.  As it goes on I get amazing creamy sandalwood.  Easy 10 hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1919070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1919070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SheBubs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1435160"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1435160.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SheBubs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Fat-Electrician-Semi-Modern-Vetiver-7139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"title="Fat Electrician Semi-Modern Vetiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1435160">SheBubs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This feels unfinished. Like when you trail off mid sentence.<br />
On my testing strip, I really felt the impact of the lime and it piqued my interest. However, on my skin the lime and ginger are nowhere to be found. Dry sandalwood, spicy cedar and something slightly reminiscent of sunscreen. Nothing to hatehere. But I was hoping that she would have something more to say</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1911245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1911245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Why is it labeled as powdery and warm spicy? Its neither.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="49104"comment_id="1909957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Tam-Dao-Eau-de-Parfum-49104.html?ccid=1909957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908728" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
